title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.249 - Payroll records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.249 - Payroll records

State Regulations

The records relating to the authorization, computation, distribution and payment of wages and salaries. They include payrolls, time
slips, time-clock cards, withholding authorizations, cancelled payroll checks
or receipts for wages paid, wage and salary authorizations and individual
earnings records. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
441.249

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
